definition: a meeting of heads of governments, reach the summit (of a mountain)
details:
noun
- a meeting of heads of governments
= example: a meeting of heads of governments
= synonyms: summit meeting
- the top or extreme point of something, usually a mountain or hill
= example: the top or extreme point of something, usually a mountain or hill
= synonyms: crest
- the highest level or degree attainable
= synonyms: elevation
verb
- reach the summit (of a mountain)
= example: reach the summit (of a mountain)
= synonyms: breast
